About.title: About Us
About.description: At Malena Design Atelier, you will find ready-made wedding and evening dresses, as well as the opportunity to order custom tailoring, taking into account all your wishes. Our extensive experience allows us to deeply understand the needs of each bride. During communication, we not only create a dress but also put a part of our soul into it to make your celebration a true symbol of love, happiness, and beauty. Each model is created with love by our designer so that you feel confident, exceptional, and at the center of attention during the most important moments of your life.

Services.customTailoring: Custom Tailoring: We create dresses according to your design and wishes.

item1.question: Do you offer custom tailoring for dresses?
item1.answer: Yes, we create dresses tailored to your design and preferences.

item2.question: How is quality control conducted?
item2.answer: Each detail is manually checked for a perfect finish.

item3.question: Is steaming included in the service?
item3.answer: Yes, we provide professional steaming before important events.

item4.question: Can I consult with a stylist?
item4.answer: Of course! Our stylist will help you choose a design that highlights your individuality.

item5.question: Do you offer dress storage until the wedding?
item5.answer: Yes, your dress will be safely stored in our salon.

item6.question: Can I adjust a ready-made dress?
item6.answer: Yes, we professionally tailor the dress for a perfect fit.

item7.question: Do you sew everyday clothing?
item7.answer: Yes, we create stylish items for all occasions.

item8.question: How does evening dress rental work?
item8.answer: You can choose from a wide range of elegant dresses for special moments.

item9.question: How long does custom tailoring take?
item9.answer: The average time for custom tailoring is 2-4 weeks, depending on complexity.

item10.question: Do you offer delivery or pickup?
item10.answer: Yes, you can choose delivery or pickup at your convenience.
